content:
It's great that you're considering getting expert advice from the accessories store on Main Street!

As for the birthday card, I think there might be some confusion again. As a large language model, I don't have knowledge of specific stores or their inventory. However, it's unlikely that an accessories store would sell birthday cards. You might want to check a nearby card store, gift shop, or even a grocery store that typically carries a selection of greeting cards.

If you're short on time, you could also consider creating a digital birthday card or sending a heartfelt message to Emma via social media or email. Whatever you choose, I'm sure Emma will appreciate the thought and love behind your gesture!

Remember to have fun shopping, and I hope Emma has an amazing birthday celebration!
